name: Changing Weathers
description:
Your job as the worlds top-class weather reporter is to deliver the weather every minute on the minute. However, with the constant change of weather, people are demanding more and more frequent updates! Dash through the weather station, avoiding distracting coworkers while gathering weather data in this frantic top-down game!

**Bugs**

In order to start the game, click on any button other than the play button

This game was created as a part of the 24 hour new years game jam. The goal of the game is to travel around the office in a short amount of time, while avoiding coworkers in a top-down stealth style game.

Art, Music and Sound Design by Eric Xu

Coding by Daxton Lee
